_header: He that hath an evil bill
_description: Advice for woodcutters — one quatrain (aabb) translating ‘Pertusum iestans falcastrum…’ which follows it

BLAdd60577.Transcription:
He þat hathe an euyll bylle& gothe to þe woode with
                    euyll wylleAnd hym selfe be a schrewelytyll wode he wolle
                    hewe

Wilson,  Edward. 
             “Introduction.” 
             The Winchester Anthology. A Facsimile of British Library Additional
                Manuscript 60577. With an account of the music by 
                    Iain
